body_text: Since I bugged Osmose about this, I'll point it out here too: this should be set into its own selector to avoid playing with the data inside of connect. Maybe it's worth it to build a stretchier getQueryParameter that does parsing for you, since we seem to run into the need of parsing ints here somewhat frequently.
body: Since I bugged Osmose about this, I'll point it out here too: this should be set into its own selector to avoid playing with the data inside of `connect`. Maybe it's worth it to build a stretchier `getQueryParameter` that does parsing for you, since we seem to run into the need of parsing ints here somewhat frequently.
body_html: Since I bugged Osmose about this, I'll point it out here too: this should be set into its own selector to avoid playing with the data inside of connect. Maybe it's worth it to build a stretchier getQueryParameter that does parsing for you, since we seem to run into the need of parsing ints here somewhat frequently.
